description: Turn to this salmon pizza for a fresh take on toppings. Rocket, salmon, avocado and lemon combine with cheese on slices that will have your tastebuds delighted.
name: DIY Salmon Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Mixed Leaf baby spinach & rocket

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place tomato, avocado and remaining baby spinach and rocket into serving bowls. Sprinkle cooked pizza with thyme and season with pepper. To serve, allow people to dress their own pizza slices with the extra toppings and a squeeze of lemon juice.
